Boruto creates four [[shadow clone]]s, one of which launches itself at the opponent, kicking them. The second shadow clone jumps in to continue the assault with a [[Gentle Fist]] attack, after which the three other clones attack simultaneously with a series of attacks, launching their opponent into the air with [[Naruto Uzumaki Combo|a defence-breaking combo attack]]. The real Boruto then creates his [[Vanishing Rasengan|version of]] [[Rasengan]] and, with the help of the clones, jumps into the air and throws the Rasengan at the opponent.

[[pt-br:Golpe Boruto]]
[[ru:Удар Боруто]]
